name: Hero Insurance
description:
Hero Insurance takes place in the superhero-filled city of Desvelado. You play as Jen, an insurance agent turned detective.  Mildred McGrandmother's car has been crushed, and Jen must determine who did it. Was it the infamous "Car Crusher"? The innocent-looking hot dog seller? Maybe Mildred committed insurance fraud! Or it could be something else entirely...

Features:

*3 cases

*Beautiful Pixel Art

*Talking Dog

Like the art? Follow the artist of Hero Insurance on Instagram at vakarius!
